text.section:
To qualify for registration an applicant shall be an individual who:
Is currently certified by a national pharmacy technician certification program and complies with subsection (b)(6) of this section; or
Meets the requirements of this section.
The Board may not approve an application until the State criminal history records check is completed.
An individual, at least 16 years and 6 months old, may begin fulfilling the pharmacy technician registration requirements under this subtitle.

section.section: Subject to the provisions of this subsection, the Board may waive any requirement of this subtitle for an individual who is registered as or has worked as a pharmacy technician in another state.

The Board may grant a waiver under this subsection only if the applicant:
